There is certainly a role for the arbitration of disputes, and other forms of alternative dispute resolution, in our system of justice. I know this from experience. The FAIR Act and my amendment‚Äîto allow arbitration when it is optimal‚Äî recognize this role. pic.twitter.com/Uy253QdceY

The FAIR Act protects the freedom to contract, the freedom of choice, and the freedom granted in our Constitution, including its Seventh Amendment. Read more here:  http://fletcher.house.gov/news/do¬†...

The FAIR Act is about restoring access to justice for the American people. It is for the millions of Americans who are denied their rights to seek justice and accountability today because of forced arbitration.
Today, the House passed the FAIR Act, which prohibits the enforcement of forced arbitration in contracts involving consumer, employment, antitrust, and civil rights disputes.
